sentence.Network_en: Hubert: Timothy is loading the final catalogue data as we speak, Milord.
sentence.Network_cn: 休伯特: 泰默瑟正在安.也就是我们所说的最后的目录数据, 大人.

sentence.Network_en: This howling wind cuts to the bone and you're not even shaking. Milord are you alright?
sentence.Network_cn: 这些呼啸的寒风如此刺骨,但您却一点动摇的感觉都没有殿下,您还好 吗 ?

list.abs: 勇敢的心&nbsp;Braveheart&nbsp;中英... ... You may return to your embroidery. 你可以回去绣花了. Humbly,milord. 遵命，陛下.
